name: The Sunny Side
description:
Navigate this small level in search of it's secrets. There's not that much I can say about this level.

Game created in Godot.

Level Design and Coding:
Catarina Pereira, assisted by Pedro Caetano

Asset pack:
Deep night, a 8x8 platformer asset pack by VEXED

Aditional art:
Pedro Caetano and Catarina Pereira

Music and sound from Youtube Audio Library:
Just Stay - Aakash Gandhi
This is Not Drum and Bass - True Cuckoo
Human Fart
Laser Gun
M4 Shots
Cartoon Boing

Retro font:
8-bit pusab by Seba Perez
